titleInfo.title: HODGES v. SHANNON et al
titleInfo.subTitle: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS THAT THE MOTION TO EXPAND THE RECORD AND/OR TO STAY THE PROCEEDINGS BE DENIED. IT IS FURTHER RECOMMENDED THAT THE PETITION FOR A WRIT O HABEAS CORPUS BE DENIED AND THAT A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHOULD NOT ISSUE, ETC. PETITIONER MAY FILE OBJECTIONS TO THIS REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION. FAILURE TO FILE TIMELY OBJECTIONS MAY CONSTITUTE A WAIVER OF ANY APPELLATE RIGHTS. OBJECTIONS TO R&R DUE BY 10/28/2008. SIGNED BY MAGISTRATE JUDGE DAVID R. STRAWBRIDGE ON 10/7/08. 10/7/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:07-cv-05036; HODGES v. SHANNON et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of Pennsylvania
extension.docketText: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS THAT THE MOTION TO EXPAND THE RECORD AND/OR TO STAY THE PROCEEDINGS BE DENIED. IT IS FURTHER RECOMMENDED THAT THE PETITION FOR A WRIT O HABEAS CORPUS BE DENIED AND THAT A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHOULD NOT ISSUE, ETC. PETITIONER MAY FILE OBJECTIONS TO THIS REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION. FAILURE TO FILE TIMELY OBJECTIONS MAY CONSTITUTE A WAIVER OF ANY APPELLATE RIGHTS. OBJECTIONS TO R&R DUE BY 10/28/2008. SIGNED BY MAGISTRATE JUDGE DAVID R. STRAWBRIDGE ON 10/7/08. 10/7/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )

titleInfo.title: HODGES v. SHANNON et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER THAT THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED; PETITIONER'S MOTION TO STAY PROCEEDINGS IS DENIED; THE PETITION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IS DENIED; A CERTIFICATE OF APPALABILITY SHALL NOT ISSUE, ETC.; AND THE CLERK OF COURT SHALL MARK THIS CASE CLOSED FOR STATISTICAL PURPOSES.. SIGNED BY HONORABLE GENE E.K. PRATTER ON 1/28/09. 1/29/09 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )
